Uses of Interface
dist.hmm.HiddenMarkovModel

  • Packages that use HiddenMarkovModel

    dist.hmm

    • Uses of HiddenMarkovModel in dist.hmm

      Classes in dist.hmm that implement HiddenMarkovModel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ModularHiddenMarkovModel
      The abstract base class representing a hidden markov model
      class  SimpleHiddenMarkovModel
      A hidden markov model implementation that does not use observations when calculating transition probabilities and has no notion of input / output In terms of this implementation it is a HiddenMarkoModel that uses SimpleTransitionDistributions for it's TransitionDistributions

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Uses of HiddenMarkovModel in rl

      Classes in rl that implement HiddenMarkovModel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleMarkovDecisionProcess
      A markov decision process with rewards unconditional on actions implemented using an input output hidden markov model
